answers.answer: Yes, GG22 OSS - dApps and Apps, Web3 Infrastructure (2024), Octant Community Round 1 (2024)
answers.question: Have you participated in a previous Gitcoin Grants Round? If so, please name the rounds or link the builder profile to prior rounds.

answers.answer: Impact Alpha (by Abundance Protocol) creates economic incentives to contribute to OSS and public goods. The project has already distributed over 2 million $degen to builders and creators on Farcaster for their impactful contributions.
answers.question: How does your project contribute significantly to the Ethereum network's infrastructure? Please provide specific examples and metrics if available.

answers.answer: The project creates an impact market for valuing public goods, and it does so by aligning incentives between the ecosystem and curators, while avoiding the perverse incentives of existing models. This approach can ensure long term credible neutrality of the impact market and prevent sybil attacks or other bad actors from manipulating the market.
answers.question: Describe any pioneering development work in your project, particularly in enhancing privacy, interoperability, or user experience.

answers.answer: The main problem of the project addresses is the lack of a self-sustainable model for public goods funding at scale for the network. Existing solutions (QF, RetroPGF, etc.) still rely on external sources of funding, which doesn't generate the needed feedback loops for public goods. The project integrates QF and RetroPGF in the protocol in a way that allows these feedback loops to form, thus allowing builders to contribute to public goods on Ethereum and be rewarded based on an Impact=Profit model
answers.question: What specific problems or challenges in the Ethereum ecosystem does your project address? How does your solution improve upon existing alternatives?

answers.answer:
The project plans to integrate more mechanisms of the Abundance Protocol (see whitepaper.abundance.id) until it fully enables public goods funding through Proof-of-Impact Value Consensus.
Grant will go toward full-time development of the project
answers.question: Outline your project's roadmap and how the grant funds will be used to achieve your development goals.

answers.answer: The project contributes to the decentralization and security of Ethereum by rewarding builders for impactful work, thus allowing them to focus on the most important issues of the network
answers.question: How does your project contribute to the decentralization and security of the Ethereum network?

For any project deploying smart contracts on blockchain networks, please list all your deployer addresses and their corresponding blockchain networks. Use this format for each entry: [deployer_address], [chain_id]—for example, 0x123abc..., 42161 (This represents a deployer address on the Arbitrum network). Please include a separate line for each unique deployer address and blockchain combination.

project.title: Abundance Protocol
project.description:
Wouldn’t it be great if anyone could make a living simply by creating impact in their community and in the world? Even better, if their profit equaled to their impact? That is what Abundance Protocol is building towards. Such a vision seems far off into the future, but we believe it is within reach.

To achieve that we are building a Public Goods Funding mechanism that is based on Value Consensus. What is Value Consensus? The most effective mechanism in crypto for funding public goods right now is the Consensus Mechanism - over $1T in value distributed to miners/stakers who provide the common good of network security to the network.

So what if we took this powerful mechanism and expanded it to all types of common and public good? If the community could come to consensus on what it valued and therefore could  credibly determine the impact of public goods for the community?  (see whitepaper: https://whitepaper.abundance.id)

This year we released The Abundance Economy book, outlining the vision of an economy where people can thrive by creating impact. It is available as a public good (aka for free) at https://book.abundance.id

We are now in the early stages of developing the Impact App (https://impact.abundance.id) - a Farcaster client that aims to leverage network effects (and the wealth of data from the open social graph) to allow any community and ecosystem fund what matters to them. It would also allow anyone to focus on impact creation and be rewarded seamlessly through social media tools they already use daily.

metadata.title: Abundance Protocol
metadata.description:
Decentralized networks rely on open source code that benefits millions but its developers don’t capture this value

That's why crypto is now mostly used as a memecoin casino instead of being the global economic infra it should be

This can all change if we build a mechanism that lets public goods capture value

The only project in crypto today that has a regenerative value capture mechanism for public goods is Abundance Protocol - and we're working on building this mechanism out

If you'd like to get involved, please connect with us with why you're interested & how you can contribute

For more information on Abundance Protocol, check out the Abundance Protocol whitepaper (https://whitepaper.abundance.id) and The Abundance Economy book (https://book.abundance.id)

We are now in the early stages of developing the Impact App (https://impact.abundance.id) - a Farcaster client that aims to leverage network effects (and the wealth of data from the open social graph) to allow any community and ecosystem fund what matters to them. It would also allow anyone to focus on impact creation and be rewarded seamlessly through social media tools they already use daily.
